1.notes: Choose a Fighting Style. Second Wind: 1d10 + Fighter level HP (bonus action, 1/short rest)

2.notes: Action Surge: Take one additional action on your turn (1/short rest, 2/short rest at level 17)

7.notes: Gain a feature from your chosen Martial Archetype

8.notes: Increase one ability by 2, or two abilities by 1 each, OR take a feat

10.notes: Gain a feature from your chosen Martial Archetype

1.notes: Choose 6 1st-level spells for your spellbook. Arcane Recovery: Recover spell slots up to half your wizard level (rounded up)

2.notes: Choose your Arcane Tradition (School of Evocation, Abjuration, etc.). Add 2 spells to spellbook

3.notes: Gain 2nd-level spell slots. Add 2 spells to spellbook

4.notes: Increase one ability by 2, or two abilities by 1 each, OR take a feat. Add 2 spells to spellbook

1.notes: Choose your Divine Domain. Prepare spells each day equal to WIS modifier + Cleric level

2.notes: Channel Divinity: Use divine energy for special effects (1/short rest, +1 at level 6 and 18)

1.notes: Expertise: Double proficiency bonus for two skills. Sneak Attack: +1d6 extra damage once per turn

2.notes: Cunning Action: Dash, Disengage, or Hide as a bonus action

3.notes: Choose your Roguish Archetype (Thief, Assassin, Arcane Trickster, etc.)
